languages.text: "Разумеется! Финансовые отчеты, логистические распоряжения, накладные на пищевые пайки... Без подписи глубокоуважаемого и ныне покойного главы дома Закарис были остановлены доставки в поселки серии Эгида-24. Наследники все еще разбираются с порядком передачи владений, а рапорты сообщают, что четверть работников из затронутых поселков уже умерла от голода, а большая часть оставшихся покинула периметр и до сих пор не возвращена на положенные им места!"

"Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"
languages.original_text: "Разумеется! Финансовые отчеты, логистические распоряжения, накладные на пищевые пайки... Без подписи глубокоуважаемого и ныне покойного главы дома Закарис были остановлены доставки в поселки серии Эгида-24. Наследники все еще разбираются с порядком передачи владений, а рапорты сообщают, что четверть работников из затронутых поселков уже умерла от голода, а большая часть оставшихся покинула периметр и до сих пор не возвращена на положенные им места!"

Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

"Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

"Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

languages.text: “确实如此！财务报告、后勤命令、食物运输的运单……尊敬的扎卡里斯家族首领已经不在了。没有了他的签名，我们向埃癸斯24号区域定居点的运输也停摆了。目前，家族继承人仍然在处理遗产的继承工作。我们收到的报告声称，受影响的定居点，其中四分之一的工人已经饿死了，剩下的绝大部分人已经离开了那片区域，到现在还没有回来！”
languages.original_text: "Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

traits.locale_text: “确实如此！财务报告、后勤命令、食物运输的运单……尊敬的扎卡里斯家族首领已经不在了。没有了他的签名，我们向埃癸斯24号区域定居点的运输也停摆了。目前，家族继承人仍然在处理遗产的继承工作。我们收到的报告声称，受影响的定居点，其中四分之一的工人已经饿死了，剩下的绝大部分人已经离开了那片区域，到现在还没有回来！”

languages.text: «¡En efecto! Informes financieros, directivas de logística, documentos de embarque para los envíos de alimento... Sin la firma del respetabilísimo y ahora fallecido líder de la casa Zakaris, los envíos a los asentamientos de Aegis-24 se han detenido. Sus herederos aún están lidiando con las transferencias de propiedades, y los informes nos transmiten que un cuarto de los trabajadores de los asentamientos afectados han muerto de hambre, ¡mientras que la mayoría de los restantes han abandonado el perímetro y aún no han regresado a sus puestos designados!».
languages.original_text: "Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

traits.locale_text: «¡En efecto! Informes financieros, directivas de logística, documentos de embarque para los envíos de alimento... Sin la firma del respetabilísimo y ahora fallecido líder de la casa Zakaris, los envíos a los asentamientos de Aegis-24 se han detenido. Sus herederos aún están lidiando con las transferencias de propiedades, y los informes nos transmiten que un cuarto de los trabajadores de los asentamientos afectados han muerto de hambre, ¡mientras que la mayoría de los restantes han abandonado el perímetro y aún no han regresado a sus puestos designados!».

languages.text: 「正にそのとおりなんです！会計報告書、流通指示書、食糧輸送用の貨物運送状…。大半の高官たちの署名はなく、今となってはザカリス家の当主も亡くなり、開拓地イージス-24への輸送が止まっています。後継者はまだ財産分与の最中です。それに、上がってくる報告によれば、病気に冒された開拓地では労働者の4分の1が飢死、それでいて生存者のほとんどは敷地を離れたまま、与えられた役割に戻っていないのです！」
languages.original_text: "Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

traits.locale_text: 「正にそのとおりなんです！会計報告書、流通指示書、食糧輸送用の貨物運送状…。大半の高官たちの署名はなく、今となってはザカリス家の当主も亡くなり、開拓地イージス-24への輸送が止まっています。後継者はまだ財産分与の最中です。それに、上がってくる報告によれば、病気に冒された開拓地では労働者の4分の1が飢死、それでいて生存者のほとんどは敷地を離れたまま、与えられた役割に戻っていないのです！」

languages.text: "In der Tat! Finanzberichte, Logistikaufträge, Frachtbriefe für Nahrungsmittellieferungen ... Ohne die Unterschrift des überaus angesehenen und nun verstorbenen Vorstands des Hauses Zakaris wurden die Lieferungen an Ansiedlungen in Aegis-24 gestoppt. Die Erben sind noch immer mit der Übereignung des Besitzes beschäftigt, und Berichten zufolge ist bereits ein Viertel der Arbeitskräfte in den betroffenen Ansiedlungen verhungert, während die übrigen die Gelände verlassen haben und nicht an ihre zugewiesenen Arbeitsplätze zurückgekehrt sind!"
languages.original_text: "Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat! Finanzberichte, Logistikaufträge, Frachtbriefe für Nahrungsmittellieferungen ... Ohne die Unterschrift des überaus angesehenen und nun verstorbenen Vorstands des Hauses Zakaris wurden die Lieferungen an Ansiedlungen in Aegis-24 gestoppt. Die Erben sind noch immer mit der Übereignung des Besitzes beschäftigt, und Berichten zufolge ist bereits ein Viertel der Arbeitskräfte in den betroffenen Ansiedlungen verhungert, während die übrigen die Gelände verlassen haben und nicht an ihre zugewiesenen Arbeitsplätze zurückgekehrt sind!"

languages.text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire ! Nous parlons de rapports financiers, de directives logistiques, des lettres de transport pour les livraisons de nourriture... Sans la signature de l'estimé chef de la maison Zarakis, qui est malheureusement décédé, l'approvisionnement des villages d'Aegis-24 a dû cesser. Pendant que les héritiers règlent le transfert de propriété, nous avons reçu des rapports indiquant qu'un quart des travailleurs de ce secteur sont déjà morts de faim. Pour ne rien arranger, la plupart de ceux qui restent ont quitté les lieux et ne sont toujours pas revenus à leurs postes ! »
languages.original_text: "Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire ! Nous parlons de rapports financiers, de directives logistiques, des lettres de transport pour les livraisons de nourriture... Sans la signature de l'estimé chef de la maison Zarakis, qui est malheureusement décédé, l'approvisionnement des villages d'Aegis-24 a dû cesser. Pendant que les héritiers règlent le transfert de propriété, nous avons reçu des rapports indiquant qu'un quart des travailleurs de ce secteur sont déjà morts de faim. Pour ne rien arranger, la plupart de ceux qui restent ont quitté les lieux et ne sont toujours pas revenus à leurs postes ! »

languages.text: "Kesinlikle! Mali raporlar, ikmal yönergeleri, gıda sevkiyatı irsaliyeleri... Zakaris Hanesi'nin pek saygın merhum önderinin imzası olmadan Aegis-24'teki yerleşkelere sevkiyat yapamıyoruz. Vârisleri hâlâ mülklerin intikali ile uğraşıyor. Gelen raporlarsa etkilenen yerleşkelerdeki çalışanların dörtte birinin açlıktan öldüğünü, kalanların çoğunun bölgeyi terk ettiğini ve henüz görev yerlerine dönmediğini söylüyor!"
languages.original_text: "Indeed it is! Financial reports, logistics directives, waybills for food shipments... Without the signature of the most respected and now deceased head of House Zakaris, shipments to settlements in Aegis-24 have been stopped. The heirs are still dealing with the transfer of holdings, and incoming reports tell us that a quarter of the workings in the affected settlements have already died of starvation, while most of those remaining have left the perimeter and have not yet returned to their designated places!"
